accurate_docstring: When in morningCoffeeRoutine, brew an espresso coffee, check the coffee bean level, refill beans if the level is below 20%, and set the brewing schedule to 07:00. When in afternoonCoffeeRoutine, brew a latte coffee, check the coffee bean level, refill beans if the level is below 20%, and set the brewing schedule to 15:00. When in eveningCoffeeRoutine, clean the coffee machine.
template_docstring: WHEN in morningCoffeeRoutine, DO brew an espresso coffee; check the coffee bean level; refill beans if the level is below 20%; set the brewing schedule to 07:00; WHEN in afternoonCoffeeRoutine, DO brew a latte coffee; check the coffee bean level; refill beans if the level is below 20%; set the brewing schedule to 15:00; WHEN in eveningCoffeeRoutine, DO clean the coffee machine.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningCoffeeRoutine, monitor the status of machine1. If it needs cleaning, clean machine1. Monitor the coffee bean level in machine1. If the coffee bean level is below 30%, refill machine1 with 500 grams of coffee beans. Notify the barista that the morning coffee routine is completed. When in the afternoonCoffeeRoutine, monitor the status of machine2. If it needs cleaning, clean machine2. Monitor the coffee bean level in machine2. If the coffee bean level is below 20%, refill machine2 with 400 grams of coffee beans. Notify the barista that the afternoon coffee routine is completed. When in the eveningCoffeeRoutine, monitor the status of machine3. If it needs cleaning, clean machine3. Monitor the coffee bean level in machine3. If the coffee bean level is below 25%, refill machine3 with 300 grams of coffee beans. Notify the barista that the evening coffee routine is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningCoffeeRoutine, DO monitor the status of machine1; IF it needs cleaning, THEN clean machine1; monitor the coffee bean level in machine1; IF the coffee bean level is below 30%, THEN refill machine1 with 500 grams of coffee beans; notify the barista that the morning coffee routine is completed; WHEN in the afternoonCoffeeRoutine, DO monitor the status of machine2; IF it needs cleaning, THEN clean machine2; monitor the coffee bean level in machine2; IF the coffee bean level is below 20%, THEN refill machine2 with 400 grams of coffee beans; notify the barista that the afternoon coffee routine is completed; WHEN in the eveningCoffeeRoutine, DO monitor the status of machine3; IF it needs cleaning, THEN clean machine3; monitor the coffee bean level in machine3; IF the coffee bean level is below 25%, THEN refill machine3 with 300 grams of coffee beans; notify the barista that the evening coffee routine is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningCoffeeRoutine, monitor the status of coffee machine 1. If the coffee beans are below 20, refill the coffee beans. Notify the barista that the morning coffee machine maintenance is completed. When in the afternoonCoffeeRoutine, monitor the status of coffee machine 2. If the water is below 50, refill the coffee beans. Notify the barista that the afternoon coffee machine maintenance is completed. When in the eveningCoffeeRoutine, monitor the status of coffee machine 3. If cleaning is needed, clean the coffee machine. Notify the barista that the evening coffee machine maintenance is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningCoffeeRoutine, DO monitor the status of coffee machine 1; IF the coffee beans are below 20, THEN refill the coffee beans; notify the barista that the morning coffee machine maintenance is completed; WHEN in the afternoonCoffeeRoutine, DO monitor the status of coffee machine 2; IF the water is below 50, THEN refill the coffee beans; notify the barista that the afternoon coffee machine maintenance is completed; WHEN in the eveningCoffeeRoutine, DO monitor the status of coffee machine 3; IF cleaning is needed, THEN clean the coffee machine; notify the barista that the evening coffee machine maintenance is completed.
